Item ID6603

A white magic staff is a Magic weapon which provides some magical bonuses and the autocast option when equipped. It is identical to a Magic staff other than its +1 Prayer bonus and appearance. It requires 10 Attack and the completion of the Wanted! quest to wield.

To obtain it, you can buy it from Sir Vyvin with a rank of 'Noble'. It can also be bought on the Grand Exchange or obtained through trading other players. Like all white equipment, it cannot be created via the Smithing skill.

[[File:White magic staff detail.png|left|110px]]
A '''white magic staff''' is a [[Weapons#Magic weapons|Magic weapon]] which provides some magical bonuses and the [[autocast]] option when equipped. It is identical to a [[Magic staff]] other than its +1 [[Prayer]] bonus and appearance. It requires 10 [[Attack]] and the completion of the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]] to wield.

To obtain it, you can buy it from [[Sir Vyvin]] with a [[White Knight rank|rank]] of 'Noble'. It can also be bought on the [[Grand Exchange]] or obtained through trading other players. Like all [[white equipment]], it cannot be created via the [[Smithing]] [[skill]].
